name: Xu Yang 0019
content: Xu Yang Xidian University I am currently an Associate Professor in School of Electronic Engineering at Xidian University. Before that I obtained my PhD degree in School of Electronic Engineering, Xidian University, under the supervision of Prof. Cheng Deng. I received the bachelor degree in Xidian University in July, 2016. Deep Learning, Graph Representation Learning, and Clustering Executive Area Chair of Vision And Learning SEminar (VALSE) Programme committee (PC) member for CVPR, NeurIPS, ICML, AAAI, IJCAI Senior programme committee (SPC) member for IJCAI 2021 Nov. 16, 2025, four papers were accepted to AAAI2026. Sep. 30, 2025, one paper was accepted to NeurIPS2025. Jul. 1, 2025, three papers were accepted to IJCAI2025. Jul. 1, 2025, one paper was accepted to IEEE TIP. Feb. 1, 2025, one paper was accepted to WACV2025. Jul. 1, 2024, three papers were accepted to IEEE TIP, TCSVT, and TMM, respectively. Apr. 18, 2024, one paper was accepted to IJCAI2024. Mar. 29, 2024, three papers were accepted to CVPR2024. Mar. 24, 2024, one paper was accepted to IEEE TKDE. Dec. 09, 2023, one paper was accepted to AAAI2024 (23% acceptance rate). Nov. 20, 2023, one paper was accepted to IEEE TCYB. I was selected for the Shaanxi Association for Science and Technology Youth Lifting Talent Program. Apr. 20, 2023, one paper was accepted to IJCAI2023 (15% acceptance rate). Apr. 19, 2023, three papers were accepted to IEEE TNNLS, TMM. Apr. 21, 2022, one paper was accepted to IJCAI2022. Mar. 8, 2022, one paper was accepted to IEEE TIP. Mar. 2, 2022, two papers were accepted to CVPR2022 (25.3% acceptance rate). I was elected as the Executive Area Chair (EAC) of the sixth VALSE.
